item.title: Donor Command? [Dementhium]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

[quote=“devenb123, post:10, topic:424573”][quote author=Eclipse634 link=topic=338418.msg3824999#msg3824999 date=1322097866]
Givemod, Giveadmin, Demote commands
Yeah. This does not include saving and loading, Not too hard to figure out. Don’t feel like releasing the whole thing so yea, make something out of it.

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("givemod")) { String name = getCompleteString(command, 1).toLowerCase(); Player other = World.getWorld().getPlayerInServer(command[1]); if (other.getRights()== 0) { other.getDefinition().setRights(1); player.sendMessage("You have promoted "+name); } } if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("giveadmin")) { String name = getCompleteString(command, 1).toLowerCase(); Player other = World.getWorld().getPlayerInServer(command[1]); if (other.getRights()== 0) { other.getDefinition().setRights(2); player.sendMessage("You have promoted "+name); } } if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("demote")) { String name = getCompleteString(command, 1).toLowerCase(); Player other = World.getWorld().getPlayerInServer(command[1]); if (other.getRights()== 1) { other.getDefinition().setRights(0); player.sendMessage("You have demoted "+name); } }
[/quote][/quote]

Edited that for Donor, didn’t work.

Read full topic

[quote=“Eclipse634, post:394, topic:256172”]Givemod, Giveadmin, Demote commands
Yeah. This does not include saving and loading, Not too hard to figure out. Don’t feel like releasing the whole thing so yea, make something out of it.

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("givemod")) { String name = getCompleteString(command, 1).toLowerCase(); Player other = World.getWorld().getPlayerInServer(command[1]); if (other.getRights()== 0) { other.getDefinition().setRights(1); player.sendMessage("You have promoted "+name); } } if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("giveadmin")) { String name = getCompleteString(command, 1).toLowerCase(); Player other = World.getWorld().getPlayerInServer(command[1]); if (other.getRights()== 0) { other.getDefinition().setRights(2); player.sendMessage("You have promoted "+name); } } if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("demote")) { String name = getCompleteString(command, 1).toLowerCase(); Player other = World.getWorld().getPlayerInServer(command[1]); if (other.getRights()== 1) { other.getDefinition().setRights(0); player.sendMessage("You have demoted "+name); } }[/quote]

item.title: Donor Command? [Dementhium]
item.dc:creator: @KdotJinxx KdotJinxx
item.description:
@KdotJinxx wrote:

My donor command works and everything. But when a player relogs they lose donor status? Why?

Here is my command. My base [as stated] is Dementhium 637.

if(command[0].equals("givedonor")) { Player other = World.getWorld().getPlayerInServer(command[1]); if (other != null) { player.sendMessage("You removed donor privilleges from "+other.getUsername()+"."); other.sendMessage("Your donorprivilleges have been removed."); other.getDefinition().setDonor(1); } }

Read full topic
